snippet: Phillips Academy in Andover, Mass., acknowledged that its former employee Dr. Richard Keller, who was arrested on a child-pornography charge, had been disciplined several times since 1999.
abstract: Phillips Academy in Andover, Mass, a prestigious prep school and pediatric hospital, acknowledges that former employee Dr Richard Keller had been disciplined several times for inappropriate behavior, but says that there was no indication that any children were harmed by him; Keller stands accused of receiving child pornography.
lead_paragraph: Phillips Academy in Andover, Mass., acknowledged that its former employee Dr. Richard Keller, who was arrested on a child-pornography charge, had been disciplined several times since 1999.

headline.seo: Andover School Says Arrested Doctor Had Been Disciplined for Pornography
headline.main: School Confronts Porn Arrest of Doctor
headline.print_headline: School Confronts Porn Arrest Of Doctor
